sourcesContent:
const styles = {
  wrapper: { maxWidth: 1350, margin: "auto", padding: 20 },
  pageTitle: { fontSize: 26, fontWeight: 600, marginBottom: 20 },
  formContainer: { display: "flex", gap: 25, alignItems: "flex-start" },
  leftCol: { flex: 2, display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: 20 },
  rightCol: { flex: 1.2, display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", gap: 20 },
  card: { background: "#fff", padding: 20, borderRadius: 10, border: "1px solid #eee" },
  cardTitle: { fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 600, marginBottom: 15 },
  label: { fontWeight: 600, fontSize: 14, marginBottom: 6 },
  input: { width: "100%", padding: "10px 12px", borderRadius: 6, border: "1px solid #ccc", marginBottom: 15 },
  textarea: { width: "100%", minHeight: 120, padding: "10px 12px", borderRadius: 6, border: "1px solid #ccc", marginBottom: 15 },
  uploadLabel: { padding: "10px 12px", border: "1px dashed #aaa", borderRadius: 6, display: "inline-flex", gap: 8, cursor: "pointer", color: "#555", marginBottom: 15 },
  previewContainer: { display: "flex", gap: 12, flexWrap: "wrap" },
  previewBox: { position: "relative", width: 100, height: 100, borderRadius: 6, overflow: "hidden", border: "1px solid #ddd" },
  previewImg: { width: "100%", height: "100%", objectFit: "cover" },
  removeImg: { position: "absolute", top: 4, right: 4, background: "transparent", border: "none", cursor: "pointer" },
  submitBtn: { background: "#ee4d2d", marginTop: 10, color: "#fff", padding: "12px 18px", borderRadius: 6, border: "none", cursor: "pointer", fontSize: 15, display: "flex", gap: 6, alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center" },
};
